name: Pizza on the Go
description:
Story

You have just moved into Maplerun Village and have opened up your very own pizza place. You received your first order for delivery - but you still need all the raw ingredients! Explore the town, collect items, make a pizza, and deliver it to your very first customer and make a lasting impression!

Web Monetization

Web Monetization users have access to the full map in the menu, rather than just a small snippet of the map.

Keys

PlayerW or Up ArrowMove player upA or Left ArrowMove player leftS or Down ArrowMove player downD or Right ArrowMove player rightEPick up item or interact with an object in the world1 - 9Equip item corresponding with the keyboard number key MenuEscOpen / Close menuRight ArrowGo to next tab in menuLeft ArrowGo to previous tab in menuDown Arrow(In Recipes tab) Go to next recipeUp Arrow(In Recipes tab) Go to previous tab1 - 9(In Inventory tab) Equip item corresponding with the keyboard number key

Credits

  • Concept, Development, UI, Art by Melky Pop 
  • Music by Melky Pop's husband ;-)
  • Additional art by Kenney https://www.kenney.nl/assets
  • Made with Phaser http://phaser.io/

Thank you for playing! I had a lot of fun making this and learned a lot in the process! I'll have more gamedev and art stuff on my Twitter, hope you can check it out and follow along! https://twitter.com/melkypop
